member.name: M:BatchAPI.Controllers.BatchController.Batch(System.Guid)
member.summary: Get details of the batch including links to all the files in the batch.
member.remarks: This get will include full details of the batch, for example it's status, the files in the batch.
member.response: OK - Return details about the batch.
Bad request - could be an invalid batch ID format. Batch IDs should be a GUID. A valid GUID that doesn't match a batch ID will return a 404.
Unauthorised - either you have not provided any credentials, ot your credentials are not recognised.
Forbidden - you have been authorised, but you are not allowed to access this resource.
Not Found - Could be that the batch ID doesn't exist.
Gone - the batch has been expired and is no longer available.
